text: The DBMS picks an index to find the tuples that the query needs. Which index to use depends on: — What attributes the index contains — What attributes the query references — The attribute's value domains — Predicate composition — Whether the index has unique or non-unique keys = Î £ZCMU-D8 ‘ : ( ; L —— w u , 4 » Pl o) 3627/1:05:37 - HEAP CLUSTERING > 9 $ # O œ 12 - Query Execution | (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
